Avoid reading from or writing to the cache, instead using a temporary directory for the duration of the operation [env: UV_NO_CACHE=]
Disable use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_NO_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Disable automatic downloads of Python. [env: "UV_PYTHON_DOWNLOADS=never"]
Path to the cache directory [env: UV_CACHE_DIR=]
Require use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Avoid reading from or writing to the cache, instead using a temporary directory for the duration of the operation [env: UV_NO_CACHE=]
Disable use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_NO_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Disable automatic downloads of Python. [env: "UV_PYTHON_DOWNLOADS=never"]
Upgrade a tool, and specify it to use the given Python interpreter to build its environment. Use with `--all` to apply to all tools. [env: UV_PYTHON=]
Path to the cache directory [env: UV_CACHE_DIR=]
The method to use when installing packages from the global cache [env: UV_LINK_MODE=] [possible values: clone, copy, hardlink, symlink]
Require use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Avoid reading from or writing to the cache, instead using a temporary directory for the duration of the operation [env: UV_NO_CACHE=]
Disable use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_NO_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Disable automatic downloads of Python. [env: "UV_PYTHON_DOWNLOADS=never"]
The Python interpreter to use for locking and filtering. [env: UV_PYTHON=]
Require use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Disable use of uv-managed Python versions [env: UV_NO_MANAGED_PYTHON=]
Disable automatic downloads of Python. [env: "UV_PYTHON_DOWNLOADS=never"]
The Python interpreter to use for the virtual environment. [env: UV_PYTHON=]

subcommands.name: version
